about_the_game:
Cubic Dungeons is a voxel art dungeon crawler set on a mysterious island cut off from the rest of the world by a raging storm. The islanders inhabiting the island live off going down a deep chasm located in a central part of the island and acquiring various items. But going down the chasm comes with a cost: the deeper you go, the more powerful is the curse that makes it increasingly difficult to return to the surface. Some never return…

Welcome to a world inspired by slavic mythology and the works of J.R.R. Tolkien. Meet, cooperate and fight humans, various mythological creatures, elves, dwarves and many others.

The plot will be partially non-linear, no playthrough or replayed level will ever be the same. Worth noting is the fact that the player’s moral choices will have a significant impact on the course and experience of the game. Depending on the choices made, the player will receive one of numerous endings.

Are you a fan of classical hack’n’slash and action RPGs? Then you will love the Cubic Dungeons experience. But there's a twist! We are introducing new mechanics and systems that aren’t typically found in action RPGs.
detailed_description:
Cubic Dungeons is a voxel art dungeon crawler set on a mysterious island cut off from the rest of the world by a raging storm. The islanders inhabiting the island live off going down a deep chasm located in a central part of the island and acquiring various items. But going down the chasm comes with a cost: the deeper you go, the more powerful is the curse that makes it increasingly difficult to return to the surface. Some never return…

Welcome to a world inspired by slavic mythology and the works of J.R.R. Tolkien. Meet, cooperate and fight humans, various mythological creatures, elves, dwarves and many others.

The plot will be partially non-linear, no playthrough or replayed level will ever be the same. Worth noting is the fact that the player’s moral choices will have a significant impact on the course and experience of the game. Depending on the choices made, the player will receive one of numerous endings.

Are you a fan of classical hack’n’slash and action RPGs? Then you will love the Cubic Dungeons experience. But there's a twist! We are introducing new mechanics and systems that aren’t typically found in action RPGs.
name: Cubic Dungeons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Inter Core i7-8750H / AMD Ryzen 5825u
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050Ti / Radeon graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Embark on an exciting journey into a deep abyss located on an isolated island and explore a unique fantasy world inspired by ancient mythology. Explore dungeons alone or with friends, discover the reason for the emergence of strange creatures and simply have a good time in this exciting action-RPG.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish
